name: Vera Molnar Squares
description: A recreasion of Vera Molnár's square art with the guidance of Garrit Schaap's code example. Each cell has layered rectangles with random positions and randomized bright, semi-transparent colors on a black background, creating a vibrant and glowing effect

name: Vera Molnar Traingles
description: A generative triangle grid inspired by Vera Molnár with the guidance of Garrit Schaap's code example. Each cell is made of layered triangles with randomized positions and randomized soft, pastel colors on a black background, creating a gentle and dreamy effect

name: Perline's noise
description: A landscape art by using perline's noise with the guidance of Garrit Schaap's noise example. You can see a layered mountain with a fading effect and a blue sky background, I was goign for a dreamy feeling.
